comments:
Build 20040930
I've found recent builds to be extremely flaky. Far too often, my workbench gets 
into a bad state where code assist stops doing anything and then I start seeing 
exception dialogs when I try to perform other actions. I find myself restarting 
my workbench all day long because of this.

I've found the following exceptions in my .log file repeatedly:

This build however has nasty JCore bug 75632. You can ping me if you want to
